DOC.brief_summary: This study determine safety PAZ-417 healthy adult 65 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety PAZ-417 Healthy Elderly Adults
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . A signed date IRBapproved informed consent form study specific screening procedure perform . 2 . Ability read English Spanish . 3 . Men woman great equal 65 year age study day 1 . Women must either surgically sterile ( hysterectomy and/or oophorectomy ) postmenopausal great equal 1 year ( estradiol less equal 25 pg/mL [ 92 pmol/L ] FSH greather equal 38 mIU/mL ) must negative serum pregnancy test result within 48 hour administration test article . Women surgically sterile must provide documentation procedure operative report ultrasound . 4 . Subjects hemoglobin level great equal 12 g/dL screen visit . Exclusion 1 . Any significant unstable uncontrolled cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . 2 . History vascular disorder ( peripheral , coronary , venous ) , chronic inflammatory disorder ( eg , rheumatoid arthritis ) , hematologic disorder , bleed disorder ( eg , hemophilia , idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura , VonWillebrand disease ) . 3 . Presence history symptomatic vertigo , significant cardiac valvular disease , congestive heart failure , angina pectoris significant cardiac arrhythmia , seizure .
